message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.HC, cs.MM

This paper is about facial action unit recognition using convolutional neural networks (CNNs). Therefore, the most likely arXiv CS sub-category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also proposes a novel method for integrating boosting into the CNN, which involves updating the model incrementally. This suggests that the paper could also be relevant to the sub-categories of cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). Additionally, the paper focuses on recognizing facial expressions, which is a topic related to human-computer interaction (HCI), suggesting that it could also be relevant to the sub-category of cs.HC (Human-Computer Interaction). Finally, the paper evaluates its method on benchmark AU databases, which suggests that it could also be relevant to the sub-category of cs.MM (Multimedia).
